body: {"operationName":"SearchMostTop10Star","variables": {"queryString":"react","first":5},"query":"query SearchMostTop10Star($queryString: String!, $first: Int) {  search(query: $queryString, type: REPOSITORY, first: $first) {    repositoryCount    edges {      node { ... on Repository { nameWithOwner name id databaseId createdAt descriptionHTML url resourcePath updatedAt defaultBranchRef { name __typename } owner { id login __typename } primaryLanguage { name color __typename } languages(first: 5) { nodes { name __typename } __typename } descriptionHTML stargazers { totalCount __typename } forks { totalCount __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename } __typename }}" }
